text:
How to solve a multi step equation with variables and parenthesis on both sides

\begin{array}{r}\n4(a+2)-2 a=10+3(a+3) \\\n9 a+8-2 a=10+3 a+9 \\\n4 a+8-2 a+8=10+9+3 a \\\n2 a+8=19+3 a \\\n4 a-2 a+8=12 \\\n2 \\\n3\n\end{array}[imath]4(a+2)-2 a=10+3(a+3) [/imath] [imath]9 a+8-2 a=10+3 a+9 [/imath] [imath]4 a+8-2 a+8=10+9+3 a [/imath] [imath]2 a+8=19+3 a [/imath] [imath]4 a-2 a+8=12 [/imath] [imath]2 [/imath] [imath]3[/imath]
